q: fanatics have other ideas. ''We hear Susan Boyle has invited Simon Cowell and Piers Morgan , but both are busy so we'll dress up as them to get in!'' said a couple of fanatics. I've already painted my teeth white and had my hair cut like a toilet brush! I look like a dead ringer now! boasted one of the fanatics. the collapse of such a dictatorship was ''inevitable'' in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world. ''What comes next, it's hard to predict,'' Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now. ''The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued, ''because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
